website_summaries.verdict: A change in sensor brings the 30x zoom Canon PowerShot SX510 HS' photo and movie quality as well as its shooting performance up a notch.
pros: The Canon PowerShot SX510 HS is a very good value thanks to a new sensor, offering up excellent image quality and performance for its budget-friendly price
It also has built-in Wi-Fi for easier on-the-go sharing, among other things
cons: Despite the updated sensor, the SX510 HS' shooting performance might still be too slow for action shots, especially indoors
With no viewfinder, you have to use the LCD for framing all your shots

website_summaries.verdict: The Wi-Fi-equipped Canon PowerShot SX510 HS is a perfectly capable long zoom camera with an affordable sticker price. Images are generally sharp, but show some noise.

customer_reviews.title: This helped me out a great def a great camera to record on I just ...
customer_reviews.text: This helped me out a great def a great camera to record on I just started a youtube and I use this for my photos and videos and It looks great check it out if you wanna see if in action Youtube iiamkee21 Ill post a pic I took with this camera def a good starting out camera
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Takes Some Practice
customer_reviews.text: After years of point and shoot cellphone camera convenience, I needed something that can take clear photos macro scale and low light situations. It took me a while to figure out how to adjust the settings. But after some practice I'm getting the photos that I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Wow. This camera blew me away!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one week before having to travel to Europe for an airshow. All I can say is I got phenomenal results particularly with the auto function and aircraft flying by. Stunning pictures that were crisp. It is not SLR quality but for $200 I was extremely pleased. Great camera that with a 32GB card and max resolution set allowed over 10,000 pictures to be on one card-amazing. 30X optical zoom with IS was surprisingly effective and also blew me away. I really warmed up to this camera in short order plus it is small and easy to use. I do miss having a viewfinder but not a big deal in the end. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mishka

customer_reviews.title: Soft images
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone 5s. I love the photos that I take with my phone. However I also wanted the ability to take cameras with an optical zoom. After reading all of the reviews I selected this camera expecting to get at least as high of quality as my 5S. No such luck. I took side by side photos without the zoom. The Canon photos were of amazingly poor quality compared to the 5S. I was actually shocked by the difference. If you want a point and shoot and aren't picky about getting a sharp photo this camera is easy to use. I like the grip on the side. Just don't expect to print this larger than 4x6.
customer_reviews.author: KRB

customer_reviews.title: very nice camera. smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: very nice camera. smaller than expected, but in a good way. not a mini camera and not a full sized one either, it is in between. great zoom. wifi, hdmi mini jack, and uses rechargeable batteries, with included charger. buy spare batteries so you are ready. no usb cable comes with this camera,, so if you like to download to your computer with a cable you have to buy it. an old usb cable i had from an olympus camera worked with mine so i lucked out, other than that the cable is about $5 on amazon. the newer model canon sx520 offers a bigger zoon, it is a bigger camera , and a few more features,, but no wifi.
customer_reviews.author: mark russo

customer_reviews.title: Great compact & reliable camera
customer_reviews.text: I received the Canon SX510 HS in less than a week. I use this camera for work to take up to 1500 photos a day for used car dealerships. I have been through about 12 cameras in my 8 yrs doing this. This one has held up the best by far. I have had to replace most of my cameras because the lock on the battery door would break or the lens would stop retracting. This camera has great zoom for its size, battery life is great and has a very fast focus. I have not been able to find this camera in stores and I am glad that found it here, and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin A

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Canon powershot for years that I loved, I dropped it and broke the lens retractor. I ordered this without seeing it in person. I didn't realize the lens doesn't retract, making it too bulky to slip in your purse. It has a strap that goes around your neck. I was hoping this was more portable. Also, the lens cap is separate, instead of just shutting off the camera, you have to put the lens cap off and on every time you go to use it. The photos seem to come out brighter. I'm not happy with 50% of the shots. It's a disappointment after my last powershot.
customer_reviews.author: QueenB

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It's really a steal at $70! Even tho it's only 12mp, they're still really good pictures. And to top it off, it has a rechargeable battery (unlike others in this bridge camera category that's need 4 AA batteries) and brings MASP controls (Manual mode, Aperture mode, Shutterspeed mode, and Program mode) to such an entry level camera. It's perfect for those just starting out but not wanting to invest a lot. Focusing is a bit slow, but still reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Moses Steward

customer_reviews.title: this camera is better than its newer configuration
customer_reviews.text: According to Digital Photography review, this camera is better than its newer configuration. I have owned (still do) 35 mm Canon cameras. Tried using an early digital Nikon (mistake!), and after several years, thought to try again, returning to the brand that I love, Canon. I would give this product 5 stars except for the fact that the instructions are only available on CD ... there's no booklet. Being a confirmed luddite, not have pages to turn, a familiar way of reading by index, the information about the camera is frustrating for me. What I have learned so far (and my learning has slowed considerably due to my reluctance), is that this was indeed a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: potterfan

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera. Its controlls are too compllicated
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera. Its controlls are too compllicated. I can't use the Wi-fi download easily and reliably. Neither the camera or the software for wi-fi transfer is user friendly. The video feature saves video in a format that is not compatible with Microsoft Windows media viewer. Not a useful format. It also does not have an option to delete all photos from the memory card and start over once they have been transferred to my computer. Deleting one at a time takes way too long to be useful. Some improvement needed for this camera. .
customer_reviews.author: The Old Philosopher

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE 30X OPTICAL ZOOM
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THIS AS AN UPGRADE FROM MY CANNON POWERSHOT BECAUSE I WANTED A MORE PROFESSIONAL MODEL FOR MY PICTURE TAKING. I HAVE NOT USED IT EXTENSIVELY ENOUGH TO GIVE ANY CONS YET BUT EXPECT TO DURING THE SUMMER WHEN TRAVELING. I WILL UPDATE THIS RATING IF ANYTHING SIGNIFICANTLY BAD IS DISCOVERED. SOME PROS ARE IS THAT IT IS LIGHT, VERY LIGHT WEIGHT. IT DOES A WONDERFUL JOB WITH THE 30X + ZOOM. I HAVE TO LEARN TO USE THE OTHER MODES FOR VARIOUS LIGHTING, ETC. HOWEVER, IF THAT DOESN'T WORK OUT...AUTO IS ALWAYS THE BEST TO USE. THE CAMERA IS AS DESCRIBED, NEW AND, WAS DELIVERED INTACT IN PROTECTION PACKAGING AND IN WORKING CONDITION.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good Lightweight Camera at this Price Point
customer_reviews.text: I moved up to this camera from a $100-level Canon. I like that the controls and instructions are similar. Also I love how lightweight it is -- it does not have AA batteries where the "hump" is -- everything runs off one Lithium battery, saving weight. My main disappointment is that is it not shockingly sharper than the cheaper Canon. But it DOES zoom a lot during both stills AND MOVIES, so those are big pluses. So all in all , quite satisfied, but not blown-away by the photos it takes.
customer_reviews.author: Harland Melville

customer_reviews.title: Although some reviews on here said indoor pics weren't very good, we love this camera for both indoor & ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this my for teenage daughter who was tired of the so-so pics from her iPhone. Although some reviews on here said indoor pics weren't very good, we love this camera for both indoor & outdoor pics. We're not professionals, but we like our pics to look nice & she has a good eye for photography. She's having a great time with this camera, it's easy to use, takes beautiful pics & is very light-weight. I highly recommend this camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best camera ever! I was able to set up the wireless on my own! It took me a while but it was very easy to do! The pictures are outstanding. The camera is simple to use. Point and shoot. It is very fun learning all the capabilities of the camera. The battery life is great too. I am thrilled to have purchased this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I have a canon DSLR and have had several way back to using film and recording settings in a notebook. Was looking for a small, take along camera but one that had some flexibility in settings. This one is perfect. Gives you many options for auto settings as well as manual mode. I'm fairly sure that except for the ability to change lenses, it is far more capable then my DSLR. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blusky

customer_reviews.title: A versitle small and light vacation camera.
customer_reviews.text: Canon cameras have always been some of my favorites for their consistently high quality, easy to use menus and variety of options. Because this unit is so small and lightweight, it makes a perfect vacation camera. Especially so with its 30X zoom lens and CMOS sensor. The only thing better would be a DSLR such as the Canon Rebel or the Sony A58. Another option is the Sony A3000. All of this depends upon what weight and size works for you.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel RichTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Happy I got it - easy yet great close up shots
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning the ins-and-outs but I can get great close-ups of birds when I am out birding - then I can come home and look in the book for the true identity - very helpful for a novice birder. I sort of with there was a cover for the back screen and I miss having an optical viewfinder since it is often hard to see the LCD viewer I certain light - you're really shooting blind. But I love the close-ups and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: TJ in CA

customer_reviews.title: Also the apps to load pictures through the wifi servie is horrible and too confusing
customer_reviews.text: I wish the flash was automatic! You have to manually life the flash up in order for it to work. Yikes! Also the apps to load pictures through the wifi servie is horrible and too confusing! Should be able to take a picture and send it to your computer or an email address right away. Spent a great deal of time with customer service on this and it's still a pain. The size is a nice small-ish size and I like that. Does not take continuous pictures for fast (rapid) snaps....
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Really, is it really this amazing, really?
customer_reviews.text: After five years of trying to find a good point and shoot, I finally found one that is worthy of purchase. I purchased others but they just weren't worthy. Excellent daytime and low light shooting and the video is just awesome. Starts up fast, shoots quickly, and the pictures are sharp. Only con is that it is larger than most point and shoot cameras and you'll need to flip up the flash manually but you will be happy with quality pictures and a quality camera. If you are ok with the size, buy this now!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!(infinity!)
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Work fine
customer_reviews.text: It worked as it should be. Price is a bit expensive, the quality is decent. Easy to use and carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Kwee

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes lovely photos and amazing quality videos. The videos can be used to create a realistic looking cinematic experience if you are looking to work on a project as such.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic camera for the size
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic camera for the size. I wish it had more f-stop choices, but it's not that big off issue for me as I was simply looking for a good step up from a point-and-click camera. Considering the small form factor and great picture quality, it's definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Drpiercy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. This camera is faster and takes way better ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This camera is faster and takes way better pictures than our old one. My husband has been able to get some great shots of our daughter dancing! Exactly what I was looking for. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: E. Lawry

customer_reviews.title: Decent camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is good, pictures come out fine. The reason I only marked it as 3 stars is because it doesn't seem to have a a major benefit over a regular Canon point-and-shoot. I was looking for a little more sophistication which I don't think this camera has. Its size and weight are good but then again, the point-and-shoot are more compact and give you the same results. The big zoom is nice. You will enjoy it if you are looking for a decent point-and-shoot with a nice zoom (and looks a little more sophisticated than a point-and-shoot :) ) But if you are looking for a "fake" DSLR then this is probably not what you are looking for. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: pml

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes excellent pictures. However, a couple of caveats--it does not come with a complete owner's guide. To access one you must go to Canon's website and down;load one. Also when using the zoom feature the lens begins to get unsteady. I recommend either positioning the camera on a solid surface such as a flat wall or better still use a mini tripod. Otherwise, like all Cannon products it is very good.
customer_reviews.author: John T Fielding

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a novice photographer. If you can even call me that, but I am having a wonderful time with my Canon PowerShot SX510 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera. I can take a picture of my flowers and see a water droplet nesting in the deepest recesses of them. My Moonstone Rose is beautiful. I wish I could attach a picture to prove what I am saying. The reviews mentioned some distortion when using the 30x Optical Zoom. For the novice....I can't see it. This Camera is great for me
customer_reviews.author: Franniefoot

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift for my great niece who is pursuing her interest in photography.....she absolutely loves this camera and after seeing many of the pictures she has taken with it, I am so glad I made this choice. Camera takes awesome pictures. The pictures are so detailed and clear. I.m going to put this camera on my "wish list" for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera. You will be hard pressed to find ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. You will be hard pressed to find these specs. on a sub $200 point and shoot, after this one is sold out. The replacement model is at least $100 more. I`ve only had it a few weeks, but it works great for me. You`ll want the carrying bag, and maybe a cable(it`s easier than the wifi)
customer_reviews.author: D.Fitzman

customer_reviews.title: Canon Power Shot SX510 is a very nice camers.
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Eprint is great. Works from tablet, Iphone, computer, everything! Sending photos wirelessly to computer is a breeze. Photographs are great too. Optical zoom and the reasonable price is what made me choose this camera. It is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Bertie

customer_reviews.title: A powerful little camera, great for nature shots and long landscapes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on a safari trip - took a few days to get used to, but after that, it was almost second nature. Many possible helpful settings. Primary issue was that at 'long' lens settings, following action on the screen was more difficult than using a viewfinder, such as one has on a true single-lens reflex. Unfortunately it's a little awkward to carry without a case, so I'm still using my compacts for the day-to-day stuff. Can't beat it for the price, though.
customer_reviews.author: Siegfried Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: My favorite feature on this camera is the massive optical zoom
customer_reviews.text: My favorite feature on this camera is the massive optical zoom. I play around with it all the time, especially when I visit large open places like convention halls, mountains, or concerts. Even without a tripod, you can manage very sharp hi-res photos from hundreds of feet from your subject. The video is slightly less sharp than photos, but significantly better than filming from an iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Lady in Motley

customer_reviews.title: I FOUND IT WAS BEST TO USE SAMSUNG MICRO-SD CARDS
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFULL CAMERA . I FOUND IT WAS BEST TO USE SAMSUNG MICRO-SD CARDS , OTHERS DID NOT WORK BECAUSE OF THE HIGH DATA RATE IN HIGH RESOLUTION VIDEO MODE . IN DIMLY LIT AREAS YOU AHVE TO HOLD THE CAMERA FIRMLY TO GET A GOOD SHOT . IT WORKED VERY WELL , JUST DO NOT BE IN A HURRY TO TAKE THE SHOT , BE STILL FOR 2 SECONDS WHILE PRESSING THE SHUTTER BUTTON AND ONE WILL GET A VERY GOOD PICTURE ALMOST EVERY TIME .
customer_reviews.author: JOHN LESESNE

customer_reviews.title: great camera, but the viewfinder...
customer_reviews.text: great camera, viewfinder tough in bright situations. a monocular viewfinder might make the zoom function better, it's close to impossible to get accurate at full zoom. excellent product and foto quality for the price otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Teigeiro Torre

customer_reviews.title: SX510HS
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was very prompt and camera was very well packaged. This is my first Canon camera. I'm having a little trouble figure out some of the camera functions. I like to use macro for close up of flowers but I can not for the life of me figure out how to put it on that setting. I downloaded the manual and have read it over and over again. I think I'm going to have to call someone and try to get some help. I haven't used the camera much yet but I think I'm going to like it after I get this one problem resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a parent
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get pics of the kids in soccer as well as and animals on our property. This camera is exactly what I wanted. Great quality pictures, good distance for a shot and pretty good with movement shots. Only reason I hesitated to give it 5 stars is because I noticed at night when the lights shined on the field the pics were very blurry with movement, clear though when still. I'm no professional photographer and I like simple, this was the perfect camera
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: no viewfinder
customer_reviews.text: Without a viewfinder, it is hard to take photos in the bright sun. I just got it, so I'm no expert yet, but one thing is that the battery/card compartment has an unlock button that is not really easy to open. New style, I guess. It is good that it has a lens cap rather than the iris opening because they eventually stop opening and closing, or get stuck in between. The photos I have taken are ok so far.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mclane

customer_reviews.title: best camera ever.  so simple
customer_reviews.text: I have five point and shoot cameras. this one is by far the best ever. I had a stupid time recharging the battery , as I had the camera so long, I could not find the charger. I thought it looked like my phone and kindle charger. by the time I was nearly exasperated I found the right charger and now all is right with the world. I love this camera. not too complicated and great pictures. I am not a professional so this is all I need Shirley.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good, but hardware problem.
customer_reviews.text: I have truly enjoyed this camera for the past year. Great for when I don't want to haul the big DSLR around. But I am somewhat disappointed. Exactly 1 day after the warranty expired, I get a permanent green vertical line down the left side of the screen. Camera still works fine otherwise, but that green line is so annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Evans

customer_reviews.title: She loved it and its perfect for her
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my sister who is a mother, and takes tons of photos with her iPhone. She loved it and its perfect for her. She doesn't need anything super fancy or confusing; it serves it's exact purpose for her. I wasn't impressed with the physical size of it: it's much smaller than I anticipated. It feels kind of cheap in your hands but, that might not bother most people.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wilkens

customer_reviews.title: These is the best camera I have ever use in my life
customer_reviews.text: These is the best camera I have ever use in my life! It took me two weeks of research to choose which camera to buy and for its price range this one is the best! The newer model isn't as good as these one even!
customer_reviews.author: cherie mazzuca

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: The main purpose of me buying another camera is to take pictures of the wild animals in my backyard. I have a huge backyard, and many visitors come over on a daily basis. My old camera can take pictures if they are close enough, but I need a zoom more than x10 when they are afraid of human. This new camera has 30x zoom which is more than what I need, and pictures taken are very clear. My hands are not very strong, it's the camera eliminating the shaking. It's very neat, looks cute, made in China, good quality, awesome price.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: ... this for our trip to Yellowstone and was not disappointed. It made some very nice pictures and videos ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our trip to Yellowstone and was not disappointed. It made some very nice pictures and videos of a grizzly bear about a half mile off below the road. Very impressive optical zoom. The features are also excellent and fairly intuitive. I was able to configure the WiFi but found it to be cumbersome so we mainly download via USB now. Excellent camera otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: aolshove

customer_reviews.title: This is one awesome Christmas gift :D
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it on the 21st, and it got here Today, Christmas eve! It works just like a brand new camera and is perfect for casual or even vloging. It is a great camera with an even better price tag attached. I highly recommend this for someone who wants automated and manual control settings. This is a camera for a beginner to advanced, word of advice is to do your research on iso and aperture and so on to get the pictures you really want. Like I said fun camera and was worth every penny, works and shoots pictures just like I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: Kawaii-Kari

customer_reviews.title: Dandy camera
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for son and he loves it. He hasn't found an easy way to break it yet, even when hiking in the Bad Lands. It doesn't seem to be capable of taking a bad photo. User interface is a little nonintuitive, and the WiFi requires use of Cannon's cloud. I don't want everything on Cannon's cloud, so I went with four stars instead of five.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Pigwillow

customer_reviews.title: Very nice entry level camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this camera. It has all the features of more expensive cameras. It takes great pictures and video. File sizes are quite large so I got a 32GB Class 10 card. A tripod is needed to use the 30X zoom and not be shaky. If you know what you are doing this camera will take nice photos. Image resolution is 4000 x 2248 at 16:9.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S.

customer_reviews.title: ... I've bought in a long time that I'm really happy with. The zoom is very impressive and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first camera I've bought in a long time that I'm really happy with. The zoom is very impressive and the auto-focus works better than in most cameras. I also really like the "Live" mode, which allows an amateur to easily adjust various settings and get some creative results. This is well worth the money as an upgrade to the basic point-and-shoot.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Wayte

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this camera
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this camera. It came with some of the seller's pictures on it, and there was one dead pixel on the view screen but I don't even notice it anymore. It came with the accessories in the original packaging, and an SD card that I wasn't expecting to receive. It takes excellent, high-quality pictures for my small business!
customer_reviews.author: kbarth

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good camera for the price and it's also really good just to have even if you know nothing about them about. It hate very good zoom as well as you can see on the moon. Also the dark green leafs picture is taken with my iPhone 6 so you can compare
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Its great with the only drawback being no viewfinder
customer_reviews.text: Its great with the only drawback being no viewfinder. As usual my fair and honest review was not in response to any promise or receipt of any discount, rebate, free sample, or anything else offered that might make my review biased in anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Dana K

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not happy with Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This product performed as the reviews stated except I cannot synch the camera wireless (yet). I will contact Canon for help. What I am not happy about is Amazon stated if you purchase the camera from them you also receive a 16 gig memory card and case. I did not receive either and notice it was smoke and mirrors when looking back at the order page. All sellers can get feedback except Amazon.com which is interesting. They have dropped a huge notch in my book unless they make good on these items.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M Rumancik

customer_reviews.title: canon
customer_reviews.text: I am amateur photographer who has had limited experience with point and shoot cameras but I really like this one. I looked at another brand at a big-box store and the sales person highly recommended the Canon. I have been an Amazon customer for several years so I had no problem ordering the camera from them. Good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H Garland

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: I am so very happy I decided to spend the money on this. I love it. I took it out during the "blood" moon eclipse and I got AMAZING pictures. I can not wait to take this on my adventures!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a safari because I wanted a better zoom but not a dslr to lug around. Wow! Best pictures from a point-shoot I have ever taken. Very powerful zoom lens and a great focus system. Fast - good color. Really - this was a great purchase. Battery life is good - but you can buy spare batteries for just a couple bucks.
customer_reviews.author: St Joe Mo

customer_reviews.title: Seller has great merchandise
customer_reviews.text: Camera arrived in one day. It's condition was fantastic. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: texan

customer_reviews.title: delivery and the quality of the camera seems fine, but the package didn't include manual nor warranty card
customer_reviews.text: In terms of delivery and package, I can always trust Amazon. Fast and secure. However, this one came without any warranty papers, nor manuals. I just downloaded the manual online, but the content slip features a manual and a warranty card. Felt a little uneasy, but so far, it looks okay. The camera works fine. I bought this for the holidays, so will update my comments if something happens.
customer_reviews.author: LazyJo

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Point and Shoot
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't look or act like your typical point and shoot camera but it's very easy to use and I have no problems with it. It's not the kind of camera you can slip in your pocket obviously but it is a nice size. My only complaint might be how washed out the photos look when using the flash and you really need the flash all the time indoors to prevent the motion blur.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: feature-packed camera for travel and found this one recommended by Outside Magazine so thought we'd give it a ...
customer_reviews.text: We were seeking a compact, feature-packed camera for travel and found this one recommended by Outside Magazine so thought we'd give it a try. So far it has exceeded our expectations, and probably has even more features and capabilities than we will actually ever use. Really excellent little camera! Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Weldon

customer_reviews.title: This camera is so far the best digital camera i have ever bought and i've had ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so far the best digital camera i have ever bought and i've had a few. Takes professional looking photos without the cost of a highly professional camera. Zooms in very far and takes clear photos. That's hard to find!
customer_reviews.author: K. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera. Takes great photos. I still have a lot to learn about it, and use the settings more. It can take movies while you take photos (Movie Digest setting) -- which is awesome on holidays, you can take both and not sacrifice one or the other! I love that! I also love that it's got WiFi which makes it very easy to transfer pics from it to my cell phone or computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot SX510
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price, picture quality is good. Very easy to use. I was surprised how 'small" the camera is when I opened up the box. It would have been nice if it came with a camera enclosure b/c it spends a lot of time being jossled around in my backpack. Overall, I like this camera very much.
customer_reviews.author: L. Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Great Point & Shoot Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Powershot SX510. Wifi set up was very easy and love the ability to transfer pictures to my iPhone. Pictures are beautiful and am learning more about the features everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, a bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: A good camera! The quality of the image is pretty good. The camera is light and easy to carry. The charger and a memory card are included. Overall I am satisfied with the purchase, but the reason I rated 4 stars is that I think it is a bit overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Elen

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this camera
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this camera. I bought it about a year ago after serious research. The zoom is absolutely incredibly and it takes some really stunning outdoor photos. It's not great at taking pictures inside because the flash really messes up the picture with the lighting, but I bought it for vacation photos and it served me well. As a bonus, it takes great video with really impressive audio quality! I make singing videos for YouTube and haven't used the expensive microphone I bought since getting this camera. I'm attaching some pictures taken with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Koreena

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase with Quality Images
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for a recent vacation and it worked perfectly and the image quality was great. The camera is very light weight and easy to store/carry around. I would recommend this camera for those who want great pictures at a lower cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Good as my Canon DSLR
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. I was worried about shutter speed but his thing is as responsive as my Canon DSLR. It looks likes a mini-me of it too. Has manual mode, fish-eye and killer, killer zoom!!! Plus records Full HD with wi-fi! Awesome! Get it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Swan

customer_reviews.title: Really like this camera
customer_reviews.text: Really like this camera. I wasn't sure if it would have all the features I wanted but as soon as it arrived and started playing with it, it can do everything I want and more. Great quality pics.
customer_reviews.author: Books&MovieLover

customer_reviews.title: Powershot SX510
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for a specific purpose. A Med Cruise and tour of Rome. I have other more expensive cameras, but this fit my need. I took over 2000 pictures and the camera never failed. I can't say as much for my picture taking. This is a great little camera that I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Heli flyer

customer_reviews.title: Great videos.
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Stills are fantastic and the video is crystal clear. Battery life is quite sufficient, as long as you are not shooting a documentary. My only issue is with the WiFi. I have followed the directions to the letter and still cannot get it to connect. It is not a deal killer for me but it would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby U.

customer_reviews.title: Not entirely impressed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing low light performance. Slow to snap the shot. Image quality on the display isn't great either. On the pro side it does have full manual control, including focus. Manual focus is achived via pushbutton motor and is awkward. I likely wouldn't buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kister

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. At first I just purchased it to take photos for selling items on etsy. I actually just used it to take engagement photos for my nephew. It took amazing picture and in high def as well. So glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: thanks
customer_reviews.text: High quality and smart digital camera. Very practical and functional. Good design. Good deal. Price is low compared with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Faig

customer_reviews.title: this camera is PERFECT for me
customer_reviews.text: I am no techie, this camera is PERFECT for me. It works very well and takes high quality pictures and is perfect for my small hands. The only thing it lacks is a view finder but it has a top notch screen. :) ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Hansen

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Light weight . . Camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. Amazingly light. Canon quality and features, for a 'point-n-shoot'. Have the PowerShot S5 IS. Main difference, the S5 IS takes AA batteries (I use rechargeable batteries) and the SX510 takes a proprietary Canon battery. The lens is great and the WIDE end of the Zoom is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: VN PH CIB TET

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, not for me though.
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic camera for what it is, it's a bit too modern for my tastes though, fixed back screen, no traditional viewer...but that was my bad in picking this. It performs great and has the expected Powershot features and quality....it's also quite compact and was my go too camera for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Thomes

customer_reviews.title: It's an ok buy
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the camera, but I do not like how hard it is to actually post your pictures to the media sites. I still have not figured that one out yet. It takes really good pictures though. I also love the zoom feature. I was able to zoom directly in on my son on the football field, over 60 yards away. Great feature.... I thik they need to work on a better way to post your pictures to sites like Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: LaShondra Bell

customer_reviews.title: If picture quality is what counts.
customer_reviews.text: Not too big or complicated and the image quality is amazing. The replacement camera model is quite a bit more expensive with unnoticeable improvement in images. If you are looking for an affordable step up from a point and shoot or cell phone camera than this is a terrific camera for just that.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Good camera better than my last one
customer_reviews.text: I am being challenged by the movie/video pictures - I have not been able to get that function to work yet. The light weight and many possible adjustments are great. I finally downloaded to full instruction manual. I wish more actually came with the camera in printed form.
customer_reviews.author: IAMME

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot is the SURE SHOT!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Camera! I use camera to take photos for articles I write for the newspaper and it works great! Still learning a few things about the camera but I have no complaints. For someone who is just getting into photography I think, this is one of the best to start off with. Mic is not all that good. But for short videos this camera does it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Phinesse Demps

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Really sweet camera, occasional blurry pic, but really no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera! Get it now!
customer_reviews.text: Just starting to get into photography and this is a great semi- professional camera. Not as complex as a DSLR but a good starter camera if you want more than just a point and shoot. Lots of setting options and relatively easy to use. The wifi capability is great, after the set up process, it's easy to send pictures from the camera to your computer or smart phone! Great picture quality as well! Also it is relatively compact and light weight. It won't fit in your pocket, but it it's still easy to hold and carry around. Great option for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures It is small and easy to carry1 It is a great camera! Patty Thomas
customer_reviews.author: Patty Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Canon Excellence
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have had many cameras. I miss film, and continue to use it on a limited basis. The SX510 has shown me some amazing ways of the digital camera. The HD full video is truly amazing. This camera was a gift less than a year ago and each day I find something new to try. The con is an occasional focus issue. The pro is everything you would want and hope for in a digital camera. The grip is excellent. Navigating the visible commands and internal menu is clear. This Canon has put my digital Olympus to shame........ Regardless of your proficiency I assure you that you have room for this wonderful, dependent camera.
customer_reviews.author: Marthalie Thurston

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes beautiful picture. I though it would be a pocket size camera, it's light weight and overall it's a great camera!
customer_reviews.author: San Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: It is one great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and have kept getting thank yous for it for a few years. It sometimes out-performs the quality of my Nikon D80 in side-by-side shooting. It is one great little camera, but the video functionality can be just slightly jumpy if you move to fast with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Canon SX510 HS
customer_reviews.text: A great camera for a point and shoot guy like me. The WIFI download of photos is not as easy as I would have guessed. Still trying to figure that out. I think most users manuals are written by the folks that know the products too well.
customer_reviews.author: TeLeBo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera - even better zoom
customer_reviews.text: This camera is everything I expected and even more - - the color in the pictures is very true - every time. The zoom is so good even I was surprised after reading other reviews that said it would be. I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce K.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. I gifted it to my dad and he loves it. The wifi setting is a great addition and the zoom is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: wes

customer_reviews.title: Good buy at price I paid
customer_reviews.text: OK camera. A little lacking in contrast and resolution compared to more expensive cameras. I bought used like new for about 60% of new price. Good buy at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimball Corson

customer_reviews.title: So light weight!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this choice. Its has all the bells and whistles if you like that or you can just keep it on a simple setting and let the camera do the work for you. I highly recommend it for a step up from a very basic camera.
customer_reviews.author: daisy13

customer_reviews.title: Great Simple Camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice, easy to use camera. My wife and I wanted to try this before buying a DSLR. Not sure if we will buy the DSLR now. This camera meets our quality and ease of use requirements. Not keen on needing a large camera bag to hold $1000's of dollars of lenses and such.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. I originally had a Rebel EOS, but the lenses were too bulky for my shooting style. I traded it for the Power shot and was glad I did. Easy to use and adjust, and am able to point and shoot in an instant. The zoom is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lawman

customer_reviews.title: Gift for me!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this for Christmas.I love it! Very easy to use,pictures are very , very, crystal clear.They print out fantastically nice for an amateur like me .I have 2 golden retrievers and I love to get action as well as still photos.This camera does both nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for a great price! I love that it has wifi. Easy enough for my 11yr old to use.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin T Ragan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: For the price I can't be more pleased with the SX510 HS. Great photos, awesome zoom and all the setting you could ask for. Only issue I have had is the manual flash. Other PowerShots I've owned have had a auto pop up flash. Other than the flash issue I highly recommend the camera.
customer_reviews.author: j. dana Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality camera excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: I got a great deal on this camera great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the budget minded!
customer_reviews.text: Have taken several hundred photos with this camera now and still love it. Just a bit bigger than a normal point and shoot works well for a clumsy guy like me who likes a bit more to hang onto when taking photos. I now have a 260 SX I carry in my car everyday and this to take along on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Gun

customer_reviews.title: Terrific camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, who does a lot of nature and wildlife photography but can't afford a big lens and expensive camera body. He is currently doing a photographic "big year" of birding and he absolutely loves this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Linny86

customer_reviews.title: this I LOVE. I have a Nikon D3200 and to have ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh, this I LOVE. I have a Nikon D3200 and to have all those controls in this compact camera is amazing. The zoom is so good and the image quality is breathtaking. Fully recommended.
customer_reviews.author: V. Avila

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Point and Shot Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera the pictures are awesome it has Wi-Fi so you can send pictures as soon as you take them. The 30x zoom is clear. You can take video but I haven't tried that feature yet. I recommend this little gem to anyone as it is so easy to use. All in all I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E

customer_reviews.title: Sunlight shoots pics
customer_reviews.text: If this camera had a searcher in addition to its digital screen, it would be perfect. As it is, when there's too much sunlight or reflection outside, you cannot make out what is shown on the digital screen. An old-fashioned searcher as add-on would solve that.
customer_reviews.author: Bacon's Bits

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot SX510 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera (discontinued by manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe Canon PowerShot SX510 HS Digital Camera is a compact, point-and-shoot camera featuring a 12.1 megapixel 1/2.3-inch high-sensitivity CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 image processor to produce high resolution still imagery and full HD 1080p video. The sensor and processor work together to enable the Canon HS SYSTEM, which helps to reduce noise levels and gain greater clarity for enhanced low-light imagery. The processor also affords speed throughout the entire camera system, including High Speed AF and Zoom Framing Assist. The built-in Canon 30x optical zoom lens provides a 35mm-equivalent focal length range of 24-720mm, covering wide-angle to super telephoto lengths. The reach of this lens is enhanced by the optical image stabilization system that works to reduce the appearance of camera shake. Six distinct settings of Intelligent IS image stabilization are also available, and can be automatically applied to suit the type of shooting and subject matter.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 Untitled Document 

SUPER ZOOM, EASY SHARING
Compact and comfortable to hold, the PowerShot SX510 HS camera creates images hard to match with a smartphone, with wireless sharing from virtually anywhere. Newly expanded built-in Wi-Fi® offers quick and easy setup, and lets you post to Facebook®, Twitter®, YouTube™ and Flickr®, send to email, plus share with your tablet, smartphone, networked PC and wireless PictBridge certified printer. With the ultra-powerful 30x Optical Zoom, you can capture an athlete's facial expressions from up in the bleachers, achieving crisp clarity with Canon's Optical Image Stabilizer. The 24mm Wide-Angle lens captures family groups and landscapes with ease. Experience low-light shooting like never before with the Canon HS SYSTEM: a 12.1 Megapixel High-Sensitivity CMOS Sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor. And preserve memories you'll want to relive in spectacular 1080p Full HD Video. Smart AUTO senses and chooses the perfect camera settings for 32 pre-defined scenes, making every shot (and video) a winner. Shooting is fun and spontaneous with High Speed AF, and Zoom Framing Assist makes it easy to keep subjects in sight at the long end of the zoom. The camera is equipped with Intelligent IS that diminishes blur caused by camera shake, and a big, bright 3.0-inch LCD screen makes it easy to shoot and review your stills and video.

SHARE IMAGES AND VIDEO, WHEREVER, WHENEVER
BUILT-IN WI-FI® GIVES YOU MORE OPTIONS FOR SHARING WITH FRIENDS, FAMILY AND THE WHOLE WORLD
The PowerShot SX510 HS camera is equipped with built-in Wi-Fi® technology for on-the-go convenience when you want to share your photos and videos with friends, family and the whole world. The camera can connect directly to both iOS® and Android™ devices*, and upload images via the free Canon CameraWindow app** without a computer. Easily post your images to social networking and media sites – Facebook®, Twitter®, YouTube™, and now Flickr® – through CANON iMAGE GATEWAY# or save them to the online photo album to share anytime, anywhere. Enhanced Wi-Fi® makes posting in real time possible, so you can keep everyone up to date with photos even as events unfold. Easily control the destination of your uploads to social networking sites; share with everyone, or send photos to selected groups. You can also add comments! Transfer images to other Wi-Fi® equipped PowerShot cameras, send images to your computer, or print your photos directly to a wireless PictBridge certified printer.

ENHANCED WI-FI® FEATURES MAKE CONNECTING AND SHARING EASIER THAN EVER
Built-in Wi-Fi® on the PowerShot SX510 HS camera has new features that streamline set-up and sharing for a faster, easier, more comprehensive experience than ever. WEP Key input is no longer necessary, and you can even set up and manage your camera/web service transfer preferences without the use of a software CD or USB cable – Wi-Fi® and a web browser are all you need! And, new Automatic Switching through the Image Sync function makes saving and organizing your images easier##. When the camera finds a linked PC on the same wireless network, images are sent directly to it. Otherwise, images are temporarily stored on CANON iMAGE GATEWAY# then transferred once a connection is made, eliminating the need for cables.

* Compatible with iOS version 6.0/6.1 or later and Android devices version 2.3/4.0/4.1/4.2 or later. Data charges may apply.
** This software enables you to upload images to social network sites. Before uploading images, please be aware that image files may contain privacy related information such as people and places. If necessary, please delete such information. Canon does not obtain, collect or use such images or any information included in such images through this software.
# One-time registration is required on CANON iMAGE GATEWAY online photo album.
## Initial set up is required.

ADVANCED OPTICS CAPTURE THE WORLD AS YOU SEE IT
POWERFUL 30X OPTICAL ZOOM WITH 24MM WIDE-ANGLE LENS
Given the PowerShot SX510 HS camera's compact size and attractive proportions, it is especially impressive that the camera is equipped with a mega-powerful 30x Optical Zoom. With a 35mm film equivalent focal length that extends all the way from 24mm to 720mm, your shooting reach is superb: you'll capture telephoto shots with detail like never before. The Wide-Angle Lens gives your images a distinctive sweep and grandeur, capturing landscapes, cityscapes, tall buildings and wide groups of people with ease. Genuine Canon optics help ensure that your images are resonant with the clarity and brilliance made possible by Canon's decades of industry leadership in optical technology.

EXPERIENCE THE IMAGING POWER OF THE CANON HS SYSTEM
12.1 MEGAPIXEL HIGH-SENSITIVITY CMOS SENSOR
The PowerShot SX510 HS camera employs a Canon 12.1 Megapixel High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor, which delivers state-of-the-art imaging performance and is optimized for use in compact cameras. Utilizing a sophisticated light-capturing design, it provides high sensitivity for improved high ISO capture with reduced noise. It is also a high-speed design, capable of rapidly capturing and moving image data to the processor, enabling faster continuous shooting and faster autofocus.

CANON DIGIC 4 IMAGE PROCESSOR
Canon DIGIC Image Processors have set the standard for functionality and performance since their groundbreaking introduction in 1999. With each successive generation, DIGIC Image Processors have brought elevated performance and powerful new features to PowerShot digital cameras. The DIGIC 4 Image Processor has ushered in high levels of picture quality and accelerated processing, making possible features such as high-speed continuous shooting, Full HD video and Face Detection Self-timer. More powerful noise reduction algorithms also provide improved low-light capture.

THE CANON HS SYSTEM
The Canon HS SYSTEM lets you take bright, clear photos in an even wider range of shooting situations. Beautiful low-light shots are possible with minimal noise and maximum detail in highlight and shadow areas. The system is the result of two technologies brought together in PowerShot cameras: a high-sensitivity imaging sensor, which is able to capture more light; and the DIGIC 4 Image Processor, which actively reduces noise with high-speed image processing. The 12.1 Megapixel Canon CMOS sensor in the PowerShot SX510 HS camera incorporates advanced light reception technology that enhances sensitivity, while the DIGIC 4 Image Processor enables an ISO range of ISO 80–3200. The Canon HS SYSTEM lets you use higher shutter speeds to capture clearer images with reduced noise and blur.

MEMORABLE MOMENTS IN SPECTACULAR FULL HD
CANON FULL HD VIDEO ADVANTAGE
In addition to the Canon HS SYSTEM, the combination of the advanced CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor in the PowerShot SX510 HS camera makes it possible to shoot crisp, clear high definition video. Imagine the fun and excitement of being able to shoot spectacular 1080p Full HD video with stereo sound that you can later watch on your HDTV or download to your computer to share with family and friends. In addition to being able to shoot Full HD 1080p video at 24* frames per second, the PowerShot SX510 HS can also shoot 720p HD video at 30** frames per second.

*Actual frame rate is 23.976 fps.
**Actual frame rate is 29.97 fps.


DEDICATED MOVIE BUTTON, WIND FILTER FEATURE AND OPTICAL ZOOM FOR EASY VIDEO CAPTURE
It's never been easier to shoot videos with a PowerShot digital camera. The PowerShot SX510 HS camera has a dedicated movie button that lets you start and stop recording instantly. There is no need to go through layers of menus or operate switches or dials to switch to and from video recording mode. The camera is always ready to shoot stills or video whenever you want. The PowerShot SX510 HS also incorporates an electronic wind filter, which suppresses wind noise that can muffle or distort the sound. And unlike less sophisticated point-and-shoot cameras, the PowerShot SX510 HS lets you use the full range of optical zoom when you're shooting a video.

HDTV PLAYBACK VIA HDMI OUTPUT AND CEC
It's easy to enjoy and share the videos you shoot with the PowerShot SX510 HS camera. Simply connect its HDMI terminal to your HDTV using an HDMI cable. And because the PowerShot SX510 HS supports HDMI-CEC technology, you'll be able to control the playback of your images and videos on any CEC-enabled HDTV using the TV's remote control. (CEC – Consumer Electronic Control – is part of the HDMI specification, enabling components in a system to communicate with one another.)

A SMARTER CAMERA MEANS BETTER PHOTOS AND VIDEOS
SMART AUTO
The PowerShot SX510 HS camera features Smart AUTO: sophisticated Canon technology that makes getting that great shot as simple as pressing the shutter button. Smart AUTO automatically detects scenes by assessing various factors in both the background and the subject. Detected scenes are analyzed using 32 predefined shooting situations. The camera then makes optimal settings to ensure the best possible image capture, whether you're shooting stills or video. Smart AUTO also includes Advanced Subject Detection, which allows the camera to detect and track non-human moving subjects like animals and vehicles. With Smart AUTO, all you have to do is frame your shot and capture away.

FASTER FOCUS HELPS YOU CAPTURE EVERY SHOT
HIGH SPEED AF
The PowerShot SX510 HS camera is equipped with Canon's latest advancements in autofocus (AF) technology. Canon's newly-developed AF achieves a significant increase in speed for a shooting experience that's spontaneous and natural. The remarkably responsive High Speed AF lets you capture great shots as they happen, with reduced lag time.

Several engineering breakthroughs contributed to this major enhancement to speed. In addition to improved AF algorithms, the camera can process multiple sequences simultaneously, and takes advantage of reworked controls between AF and the start of shooting.

SUPER TELEPHOTO SHOOTING MADE EASY
ZOOM FRAMING ASSIST WITH SEEK FUNCTION AND ENHANCED AUTOMATIC ZOOM
With its 30x Optical Zoom lens, the PowerShot SX510 HS camera has the telephoto reach to capture subjects a long distance away. At maximum telephoto, however, it can be challenging to track a moving subject. The Zoom Framing Assist seek function makes it much easier to use the camera's powerful zoom lens. When you press and hold the Zoom Framing Assist function button, the camera will automatically zoom out to include a wider angle of view, enabling you to more easily locate your moving subject. Once you find it, releasing the button will cause the lens to return to its original zoom position, intelligently keeping the subject in focus until you're ready to shoot and capture the perfect close-up moment. You can even make zoom adjustments while the button is pressed, with an animated assist frame that makes viewing easy. When the button is released, the lens will return to the adjusted zoom position. And enhanced Zoom Framing Assist keeps your subject's face the same size in your frame no matter how they move. Tap the Zoom Framing Assist function button to detect your subject's face. As your subject retreats and advances the camera automatically zooms in and out so their face remains the same size. It's especially useful for capturing the expressions of fast-moving children. And, for even more convenience, the Zoom Framing Assist function is also available when shooting video.

A STEADY IMAGE IS A BEAUTIFUL IMAGE
INTELLIGENT IS
The latest advance in Canon Optical Image Stabilization technology, Intelligent IS, analyzes camera movement and applies the best shake correction method for the shooting situation. For stills, the system automatically selects among Normal, Panning, Macro (Hybrid) and Tripod IS modes. When shooting video, the system automatically selects among Dynamic, Powered, Macro and Tripod IS modes. With Intelligent IS, you can concentrate on image capture, letting the camera make the most effective IS settings to help capture the steadiest possible image.

Normal Corrects for a wide range of camera movement when shooting stills. Panning Panning motion is detected so that IS does not interfere with desired camera movement. Macro (Hybrid) Corrects for shift-type camera shake, which typically occurs in macro (close-up) shooting. Dynamic Effective for video shooting at wide-angle focal lengths, eliminating the unwanted shaking that typically occurs while walking. Powered Compensates for hand movement when shooting video at the telephoto end of the zoom range, where camera shake is magnified. Tripod When tripod use is detected, the Image Stabilizer is stopped because it is not needed. COMPOSE YOUR SHOTS IN HIGH RESOLUTION
HIGH-RESOLUTION 3.0-INCH LCD
Composing and checking your shots is easier with PowerShot SX510 HS camera's clear, high-resolution 3.0-inch LCD screen (approximately 461,000 dots). The extra resolution also makes using the camera's menu functions more convenient. The large screen is easily viewable from a wide angle, whether you're shooting, reviewing or showing off your images.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
SHOOTING MODES
PowerShot cameras offer shooting modes that make it easy to take perfect photos in a wide range of shooting situations by providing intelligent presets with optimized settings.

SHOOTING MODES/SPECIAL SCENE MODES
Manual You have complete control of exposure, selecting both aperture and shutter speed manually. Aperture-Priority You set the aperture, controlling depth-of-field. The camera automatically selects the shutter speed. Shutter-priority You select the shutter speed to stop or blur action, and the camera finds the appropriate aperture. With slow exposure times, Canon's noise reduction system activates to ensure low image noise. Program Access advanced exposure compensation features while shooting mostly automatically. Live View Control Enables Brightness, Color, and Tone adjustments to your images using easy-to-understand controls. Smart AUTO The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity. Movie Digest Records a video clip before capturing a still image and then combines one day's worth of clips into a video. Now easily playback and review clips, and delete unwanted scenes. Portrait The camera sets a large aperture, focusing the subject and artistically blurring the background to make your subject “pop.” Face Self-timer The camera waits for a face to enter the frame before releasing the shutter. High-Speed Burst Captures rapid action frame by frame, by shooting continuously at a high speed while the shutter button is held down. Low Light For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly-lit situations. Snow Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint. Fireworks Grab brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks. Creative Filters This setting provides easy access to special filter effects and scene modes, such as Toy Camera Effect, Poster Effect, Monochrome and more. Discreet Mode Disables flash, AF assist beam, and all camera sounds with one mode dial setting – so you can capture images in quiet areas. Movie Record video in stereo sound. Unwanted scenes can be deleted in playback mode. Super Slow Motion Movie Record your clips in high speed (approx. 240 fps), and then watch your videos in slow motion. SPECIAL SCENE MODES WITH CREATIVE FILTERS
Special Scene Modes have fun and creative filters you can add to your photos without having to use a computer. You can make a quirky portrait using a Fisheye Lens Effect or add a beautiful single-tone effect with Monochrome. Toy Camera Effect simulates a vintage look as if capturing the photo using a “toy” or pinhole camera. Make a scene appear like a small-scale model with Miniature Effect, when shooting from a high vantage point. Super Vivid enhances an image for bright, intense colors while Poster Effect alters the contrast of an image for poster-like presentation.

ECO MODE
The PowerShot SX510 HS camera takes energy conservation to the next level with ECO Mode, which provides more shots per single charge through monitor and camera power management. ECO Mode can be activated for easy power preservation when an outlet is unavailable. ECO Mode quickly wakes the camera from sleep when a button is pressed or with a touch of the LCD screen. With ECO Mode activated to conserve power, you can even stay connected for longer with the built-in Wi-Fi® feature on the PowerShot SX510 HS. With ECO Mode, you can be sure that your camera will keep up when fun with family and friends runs late into the night!

AVAILABLE IN 30 LANGUAGES
There are now a total of 30 display languages from which you can choose: English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Simplified/Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Portuguese, Korean, Greek, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish, Thai, Arabic, Romanian, Ukrainian, Farsi, Hindi, Malay, Indonesian and Vietnamese.
feature_bullets: Capture beautiful 1080p full HD video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button, zoom while shooting and play back videos on an HDTV via the HDMI output
Large 3-inch color LCD with a screen resolution of 461,000 dots enables easy viewing from a wide angle
12.1 megapixel high-sensitivity 1/2.3-inch CMOS sensor combined with the Canon DIGIC 4 image processor
